clickOnTheButtonBelowToChangePassword: Otherwise, please click on the button below to change your password.
clickOnTheButtonBelowToVerifyEmail: Please click the button below to verify your email.
ignoreThisResetEmail: If you did not make this request then please ignore this email.
ignoreThisVerificationEmail: If you didn't create an account with EasyReserv, you can safely ignore this email.
pleaseUseThisLink: If the button doesn"t work, please use this link.
pleaseChangePasswordAsSoon: Please change it as soon as possible for security reasons.
thankYouForSigning: Thank you for signing up with EasyReserv. To get started, we need to verify your email address.
yourVerificationCodeText: Your verification code is displayed below.
contactEmailDetailsMessage: We would like to inform you that you have received a new contact request. Here are the details:
name: Name
contactEmailCollaborationText: Please consider this request and contact the client as soon as possible to further discuss collaboration details.

notification.clientPendingReservation: Your reservation at {reservationPlace} is under review. If you want to make a change, go to Reservations.
notification.clientStatusReservation: Your reservation at {reservationPlace} was {reservationStatus}. If you want to see the changes, go to Reservations.
notification.clientChangeReservation: Your reservation at {reservationPlace} was changed, check this in the Reservations screen.
notification.staffChangeReservation: The client {clientName} has changed their reservation, check this in the Reservations screen under review.
notification.staffCancelledReservation: The client {clientName} has cancelled the reservation on {reservationDate}.
notification.staffComingConfirmedReservation: A new confirmed reservation coming up soon at the table {tableNames}.
notification.staffRequireActionReservation: The reservation for table {tableNames} is in the past and requires action.
notification.staffReadyOrderReservation: The order for table {tableNames} is ready!
